articles.description: VeeCon is back in 2023, moving from Minneapolis to Indianapolis, and creator and entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk joined Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss his aim to make it the "coolest business conference in the world." And that means expanding the focus beyond NFTs and Web3 to include AI and other tech innovations, along with broader business and pop culture content.
articles.title: Gary Vee Discusses VeeCon 2023's Broader Shift Beyond Web3

articles.description: Gary Vaynerchuk called the NFT market decline back in 2021, but the owner of CryptoPunks and other valuable tokenized assets still believes that a sustainable market will eventually form. He joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward amid VeeCon 2023 to discuss why he thinks the NFT space will be comparable to collectible sports cards, art, and even stuffed animals.
articles.title: Gary Vee on the NFT Market and Why 'NFTs Are Stuffed Animals'

articles.description: Immutable VP & Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what it's like to work in the game industry for decades and why he's not giving up on NFT games.
articles.title: What Immutable's Chris Clay Learned in 23 Years of Game Development

articles.description: A Las Vegas man has been hit with new charges as part of the CoinDeal crypto and metaverse alleged scam—and could face up to 100 years behind bars.
articles.title: Las Vegas Man Charged in CoinDeal $45M Crypto Fraud Case

articles.title: Why Azra Games CEO Mark Otero is Not a Fan of "Play-to-Earn" Games

articles.description: Solana Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the current state of Solana's Web3 gaming ecosystem.
articles.title: How Many Games Are Building On Solana? The Answer Might Surprise You

articles.description: InfiniGods Cofounders Owen O'Donoghue and Damon Gura keep it real with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, sharing thoughts on game balancing and what to do when in-game assets become NFTs.
articles.title: Problems With Being an 'On-Chain Purist'  in Gaming

articles.description: Solana Foundation's Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Solana's "build together" approach as well as his thoughts on crypto firms becoming game publishers.
articles.title: Why Solana Won't Become A Web3 Game Publisher

articles.description: Hedera VP Alex Russman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Hedera's Web3 gaming ecosystem and shares a game he's particularly excited about.
articles.title: The State Of Web3 Gaming On Hedera

articles.description: Mirandus' Lead Developer and Gala Games Cofounder Michael McCarthy tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game's thoughtful approach to audio design and the technologies being built to support the MMORPG's immersive world.
articles.title: How Mirandus is Innovating Video Game Audio

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks the InfiniGods developers Damon Gura and Owen O’Donoghue about gamers and NFTs.
articles.title: Do Gamers Hate NFTs?

articles.description: Avenged Sevenfold lead singer Matt Sanders, aka M. Shadows, is rehearsing for the band's upcoming tour. He's also figuring out how to upend what it means to be a music fan. The band launched a Deathbats Club NFT collection in 2021. That is to say: They were early. The lead singer said it was timed to give fans a chance to get comfortable with Web3 technology ahead of the group's 2023 tour, when the NFT holders can use their Deathbats for early access to tickets. M. Shadows also talked to hosts Andrew Hayward and Stephen Graves about AI and bringing Web3 into gaming.
articles.title: gm: Avenged Sevenfold's M. Shadows on Deathbats, Fandom, and AI

articles.description: At the Game Developers' Conference, Mojo Melee Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their autobattler game and its unique characters, which are also NFTs on Polygon.
articles.title: Inside Mojo Melee's Lore with Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella

articles.description: "The Blair Witch Project" Executive Producer Kevin Foxe wants to avoid corporate overlords and enlighten fans of the dark "Mandala" graphic novel with a video game adaptation and NFTs across multiple blockchains.
articles.title: Why 'Blair Witch' Exec Producer Kevin Foxe Is '1,000% In' on Gaming

articles.description: "When assets are overdone, they just feel a little dirty. It's not pretty to look at," shared Mirandus' Lead Developer and Gala Games co-founder Michael McCarthy in an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Gala Games Co-Founder on the Aesthetic of Mirandus

articles.description: Solana Games' General Manager Johnny Lee offers a hot take on the first generation of Web3 gaming with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Solana Games GM: Play-to-Earn Games Are DeFi Products, Not Games
